reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan soft, cozy, and well-made, appreciating its casual style and warmth for chilly fall days.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute! Would buy again!
items.body: I was surprised how much I enjoy this cardigan. I’m super picky when it comes to cardigans and I got the burnt orange one. Super cute for fall, and it is an oversized fit. It’s super soft and comfortable. I like the buttons. The only thing that would make it better is if it had pockets (which is does not). But i can live without. It’s not too heavy either, it’s good for chilly fall days. Pairs well with layers and it’s just super cute! Read more
items.author: Emmmmmm

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Cardigan!
items.body: I love this cardigan. It is just as pictured, true to size and color, and surprisingly soft. Good value for the price. Read more
items.author: SLC

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice for dressy and casual wear
items.body: I purchased this sweater for my trip to CA for a beach wedding. It was the perfect sweater to wear as it kept me warm without being too warm on a cool beach at night. I love the knit pattern and it’s chunky yarn. It is thick enough to keep you warm, but not too thick that I can’t wear it inside my house. It is oversized, and my only issue is that the sleeves look huge on my arms. I have worn this dressed up and with casual clothes at a sports bar too. It’s a great price for the quality and I am considered buying one in black to wear around my house. I purchased the grey which isn’t really grey but more of a beige color, but it’s still pretty. I love that it has pockets since a lot of women’s clothing lacks pockets. Read more
items.author: Helen M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, warm, and super COMFY!
items.body: I needed a light Summer sweater, and this one is perfect. It's light and warm, but not too warm. I think it will also transition nicely into the cool Fall temperatures. I'm 5'5" 186 lbs with broad shoulders and a full C cup. I usually wear an XL in t-shirts and tops. I wanted it oversized and ordered an XXL. The arms are a bit long, and the length hits me mid-thigh. Still, it's just what I wanted. I ordered the khaki color. It's more on the mauve side instead of brown to me, but I like that better. The color is just beautiful and will go with so many things. It's versatile enough to be worn with jeans and a t-shirt, or a boho skirt and a tank. I'm looking forward to snuggling up in it and watching scary movies in October. Buy this sweater. You won't be sorry. Read more
items.author: SLeon

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice fitting
items.body: The pink sweater I received is a very nice sweater and it fits really nice. It's nice and warm but it looks a lot pinker on Amazon that it does. It's more of a peachy color and I wish they would get it right thank you. Read more
items.author: Debbiedo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have!!
items.body: I couldn't wait to write a review on this sweater! I wasn't expecting it to be so thick (but not too thick) and soft. The color of pink is a soft blush just as pictured. I am 100% pleased with this purchase. Because I ordered the pink it came directly from China so it did take a minute to get here but not too bad! I love love this sweater for cooler summer days/nights over a cute cami and shorts or over a white T-shirt or long sleeve body suit with jeans in the colder months. I am 5'2, 135 lbs and ordered a size M Read more
items.author: SuzieJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: I am regularly a size small but I ordered a Medium because I wanted it oversized just like on the model picture. And it fits just as I wanted. It’s very comfortable and light weight. Read more
items.author: Megan Fairchild

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars soft, not white
items.body: it’s super soft and comfortable, unfortunately it is not white at all like the picture. it’s a cream or off-white color. i haven’t washed it yet and i saw a review about the arms shrinking a little and i’m 5’11 with very long arms so i’m a little worried but we’ll see. overall still cute, just wish it was actually white. Read more
items.author: alyssa

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Strawberry Pink, B Khaki, Blackish Green, B Black, Camel, Navy Blue, Dark Brown, Biking Red, Gold Flame, B Brown, B Grey, B White, Carbon Grey, B Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
